button.suggested.description: Button text, suggested indicates a recommended button

menu.orderList.description: Text in the website menu, order indicates the orders for services purchased by the user

menu.applicationList.description: Text in the website menu, application indicates the applications for services used by the user

menu.userProfile.description: Text in the website menu, user profile indicates the personal information of the user

menu.idVerify.description: Text in the website menu, identity verification indicates the verification of the user's identity

menu.manageApplication.description: Text in the website menu, application management indicates the management of user applications

menu.distributionIndex.description: Text in the website menu, referral earnings indicates the earnings from user referrals

menu.developerPlatform.description: Text in the website menu, developer platform indicates the platform for developers

menu.usageList.description: Text in the website menu, usage record indicates the history of the user's API service usage

menu.credentialIndex.description: Text in the website menu, credentials indicates the credentials for accessing the API

menu.manageOrder.description: Text in the website menu, order management indicates the management of user orders, order indicates the orders for services purchased by the user

menu.manageDistributionStatus.description: Text in the website menu, distribution management indicates the management of the user's distribution status, related to earnings from user referrals

message.benefit1.description: Text on the homepage, exclusive customer service support indicates that users can obtain support from exclusive customer service

message.benefit2.description: Text on the homepage, priority experience of new features indicates that users can experience new features first

message.buyExtra.description: Text on the homepage, indicates that the user can purchase additional credits

message.doNotWantSubscribe.message: Don't want to subscribe to the full membership? You can also try purchasing credits for individual services.
message.doNotWantSubscribe.description: Text on the homepage, don't want to subscribe indicates that the user does not wish to subscribe to the membership

subscription.weekly.description: Membership type, weekly membership indicates that the user purchased a weekly membership

subscription.monthly.description: Membership type, monthly membership indicates that the user purchased a monthly membership

subscription.yearly.description: Membership type, yearly membership indicates that the user purchased a yearly membership

subscription.introduction.description: Introduction to the membership indicates an overview of the membership
